title: Bright, comfortable 1-bed flat - SUBLET FROM 7 Oct. ALL BILLS INCLUDED
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


***Available now -  £1800 PCM all inclusive***

I am offering my one bed flat for sublet whilst I spend time in the countryside. It is tastefully furnished with everything you need for a comfortable stay including bedding, towels, toiletries, basic food needs, wifi, landline, central heating, washing machine, Alexa, and a Nutribullet too. The only thing it doesn't have is a TV and parking in the area is permit only during the weekdays. My cleaner will also attend the flat once a week to take care of the basics including ironing. 

I would prefer just one or two people in residence. The flat isn't massive (it does have high ceilings) so it starts to feel a bit crowded if there are too many people. Very happy for viewings in advance and/or to share identify documents as I am aware this website has some fraudulent listings. 

Rent is not negotiable as I am only charging my costs and making no profit on it.
